subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Oklahoma City Thunder announced the recall of forward D. J. White and guard Kyle Weaver from the Tulsa 66ers of the N.B.A. Development League. White has appeared in six games for the 66ers during three assignments to the D-League. He averaged 18.3 points, 7.2 rebounds and 1.5 blocked shots in 31 minutes a game while in Tulsa. Weaver saw action in two games during his first assignment to the 66ers. He averaged 17 points, 9 assists and 7.5 rebounds in 44 minutes a game.
